page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: Newton Mearns does not have large industries. However many people are employed locally in shops, offices, schools, hospitals and other service industries. The majority of professional and other workers commute to Glasgow, Paisley and East Kilbride. They choose to live in this very pleasant high amenity suburb of Glasgow and are within easy reach of their places of work. It is also very easy to reach places of scenic beauty, yachting marinas on the Clyde, and many other tourist attractions. Many professional workers who are transferred to Glasgow from other places are very pleasantly surprised by the quality of life that can be had in area such as this.
